if you disable the sound the game will work just fine...on the other hand if you want sound you can change the frequency...in the speaker properties change to 16Bit, 48000Hz...

@rftcmatt & @spoked
- Download 7-zip from portableapps.com
- Unzip the rar-files (just open one of them) with 7-zip
- Mount the iso with Daemon Tools (there is a free version)

If you want more info: open the nfo-file with notepad
